metadata.title: CVE-2024-43831 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: mediatek: vcodec: Handle invalid decoder vsiHandle an invalid decoder vsi in vpu_dec_init to ensure the decoder vsiis valid for future use.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
